name: slope aspect splitter
desc: Split an input field into two output fields based upon slope or aspect data using a subset expression.

properties.name: Flat Surface Aspect
properties.desc: The value to use for Aspect Value over a flat surface.

properties.name: N1
properties.desc: The N1 variable usable by expressions

properties.name: N2
properties.desc: The N2 variable usable by expressions

properties.name: Subset Expression
properties.desc: The expression used to subset the input field.

properties.name: Subset Variables
properties.desc: Variables available for determining which field to write output.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.
